Quote.Author: Brian Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: Exploring the unknown requires tolerating uncertainty

Quote.Author: Brian Greene
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to teach passionately about something that you don't have a passion for

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: The guitar has a kind of grit and excitement possessed by nothing else

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest emotion in creation is the bridge to optimism

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: We do play to our audience. It's very important. You can't create music in a vacuum

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: Mantovani was a great influence on me

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: The guitar was my weapon, my shield to hide behind

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: Astronomy's much more fun when you're not an astronomer

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anybody comes close to The Beatles, including Oasis

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: I really thought I was pretty good before I saw Hendrix, and then I thought: Yeah, not so good

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: The Wedding March has a bit of a death march in it

Quote.Author: Brian May
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing I'm embarrassed about

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a weirdo magnet, but I'm handling it better than I used to

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess the line between being paranoid and being a rock star is smaller than one would expect

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a strange bubble

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being a freak. It's great!

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you'll dress up the more fun you'll have

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: Being so honest in my writing is cathartic

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is about expressing things you can't in everyday life

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to fly off the handle in everyday life, but I'm a little calmer now

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to be held responsible for bringing back a wave of pasty-faced people into the world

Quote.Author: Brian Molko
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always found music that is carnal very attractive but not in the most obvious way

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit. Wisdom is knowing not to put it in a fruit salad

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: A physical therapist does some unbelievable stretching with me

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: You've to celebrate the good days because there are brutal days that make the good ones sweet

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I learnt early on my career is that personal gratification takes second place

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: My missus knows to leave me alone

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a football fan before I became a rugby fan

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, I supported Manchester United, and my hero was Mark Hughes

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are captain, you are never speaking for yourself

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because you lost your last game doesn't mean you change anything

Quote.Author: Brian O'Driscoll
Quote.QuoteValue: There's ego in all of us rugby players

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: Successful people are simply those with successful habits

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: The true measure of the value of any business leader and manager is performance

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: The person we believe ourselves to be will always act in a manner consistent with our self-image

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: Relationships are the hallmark of the mature person

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever we expect with confidence becomes our own self-fulfilling prophecy

Quote.Author: Brian Tracy
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: What in the world is a hangover cure?

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I still believe that something is right only when it feels right

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I listen to oldies but goodies stations, '60s and '70s music

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: To wear a floral shirt is an experience

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Beatles, the Rolling Stones and Phil Spector. Those were my idols

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I play piano all the time. I'm always at my piano, playing music

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, Rolling Stones songs all sound kind of the same

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a genius. I'm just a hard-working guy

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no outdoing The Beatles

Quote.Author: Brian Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I always do get a little bit paranoid when I get a lot of attention. But I get used to it

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: For some reason, chewing gum for me gets my brain going

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't go to prom - I was homeschooled

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: I had collages in my bedroom when I was a teenager

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, I just loved movies. It was how I saw the world, which I wanted to learn more about

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the dumbest rule is that you can't chew gum in school

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was 3 when I told my mom that I knew what my dharma was and that I wanted to be an actor

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so used to swimming with the piranhas. And they're really not that bad

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: I can be whoever I want. I can feel however I want

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really have any people in my life who aren't gypsies

Quote.Author: Brie Larson
Quote.QuoteValue: Now I find seriousness to be rather ridiculous

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Love the giver more than the gift

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Never let a day pass that you will have cause to say, I will do better tomorrow

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: A good man, is a good man, whether in this church, or out of it

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Any young man who is unmarried at the age of twenty one is a menace to the community

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Remember, a chip on the shoulder is a sure sign of wood higher up

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Honest hearts produce honest actions

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: We should never permit ourselves to do anything that we are not willing to see our children do

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: In the adversity of our best friends we often find something that does not displease us

Quote.Author: Brigham Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to live perfectly above the law, and make it my servant instead of my master

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to be unfaithful than to be faithful without wanting to be

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: We have abolished the death penalty for humans, so why should it continue for animals?

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: Every age can be enchanting, provided you live within it

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: They may call me a sinner, but I am at peace with myself

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: People are forever finding something wrong with you

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: As for being a little bunny that never says a word, that is truly the opposite of me

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: It is sad to grow old but nice to ripen

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are beasts and even beasts don't behave as they do

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: I started out as a lousy actress and have remained one

Quote.Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think when I make love

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I dress the way I want. I don't pretend to be someone I'm not

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because I look sexy on the cover of Rolling Stone doesn't mean I'm naughty

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I go through life like a Karate Kid

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like defining myself. I just am

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to be a cool chick but I'm not anymore

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never really wanted to go to Japan. Simply because I don't like eating fish

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very boring. I'm a mom. I'm 34 years old

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: I know not everyone will like me, but this is who I am so if you don't like it, tough!

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling

Quote.Author: Britney Spears
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't treat me like a little girl

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: You actually can make it, no matter what. I truly am a firm believer in that. Eminem's living proof

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the more I embrace my own idiosyncrasies

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: Home is where my mom is

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I just always have to cry out a breakup, and then I can make peace with it pretty quickly

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: My dreams and aspirations when I was a child for as long as I can remember was to be an entertainer

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being in love

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a big candy eater

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I do sarcasm really poorly

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: Curiosity did kill the cat, but I'm very curious

Quote.Author: Brittany Murphy
Quote.QuoteValue: I take work very seriously and telling the truth in my job and professionalism

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: When there's pressure, I believe people will break under it or a diamond will be created

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: You need to have laser focus on doing your job

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: I have nothing but love for my time I spent in Denver, and appreciation, and gratitude

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always going to try to win with a positive mindset

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: Coming to Houston was an opportunity that I couldn't pass up

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: As coaches say, it's about finding your role. We're coming together as a team

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime you play New England, you know it's going to be a challenge

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: As a competitor, you want to be out there in the fire with your teammates

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just concerned with winning, not individual accolades

Quote.Author: Brock Osweiler
Quote.QuoteValue: When I make a mistake once, it's usually not going to happen again

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything you need to know about Iron Maiden is onstage

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: If heavy metal bands ruled the world, we'd be a lot better off

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: With the Internet, bands can come and go every five minutes and the music looks disposable

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you really want to annoy me, ask me when I'm going to retire from rock n' roll

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The joke in aviation is, 'If you want to make a million, you'd better start with £10m.'

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short to do the things you don't love doing

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, yeah, sometimes I get a little too creative

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I do like Marylin Manson, actually. I think, he's very talented and he did make some great music

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The more guitars we have onstage the better, as I'm concerned

Quote.Author: Bruce Dickinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall refract myself, yes, I shall no longer be known as the prism

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have spent my life judging the distance between American reality and the American dream

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a sad man my friend who's livin' in his own skin and can't stand the company

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to luck, you make your own

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that is what film and art and music do; they can work as a map of sorts for your feelings

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: The best music is essentially there to provide you something to face the world with

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Talk about a dream, try to make it real

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who's grown up or lived on the Jersey Shore knows the place is unique

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Blind faith in your leaders, or in anything, will get you killed

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: The release date is just one day, but the record is forever

Quote.Author: Bruce Springsteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of the greatest blues music is some of the darkest music you've ever heard

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't undo the past... but you can certainly not repeat it

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say, 'I'm alone, but I'm not lonely.' But I was just kidding myself

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife heard me say I love you a thousand times, but she never once heard me say sorry

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really just a regular guy who has had an incredibly blessed life

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate working out. Because I work out for films now solely I come to associate it with work

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate government. I'm apolitical. Write that down. I'm not a Republican

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: But the action film genre is gonna have to come up with some new bad guys

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: They look right. And you move left

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: If you catch him, just give me four seconds with Saddam Hussein

Quote.Author: Bruce Willis
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody, no matter how old you are, is around 24, 25 in their heart

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned people are watching, so don't do nothing stupid

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't knock on opportunity's door and not be ready

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: You pick up some fans and a handful of haters along the way

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: When it's your time, it is your time

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: Hawaii is paradise. It sounds cheesy to say it, but there's music in the air there

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't try and be dark, but there are obviously darker emotions that I want to capture sometimes

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: I signed up to be a musician, I want to perform, I want to sing

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: I really wish I knew what I was doing because I'd be writing hit songs every minute

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: If I was a billionaire, I'd be smart with my money

Quote.Author: Bruno Mars
Quote.QuoteValue: No one sells a song better than the person that wrote it

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never get silence anywhere nowadays, have you noticed?

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: Secretly, I wanted to look like Jimi Hendrix, but I could never quite pull it off

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the name Atomic Kitten. It's so great

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: I like L.A., but I shouldn't live there

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: But when you get music and words together, that can be a very powerful thing

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: But I do like to have peace and quiet for a good hour

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: Women! I have no idea. I don't know anything about women at all. They're a complete mystery to me

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: Words can be very powerful. I find them very difficult

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: Performing was terrifying

Quote.Author: Bryan Ferry
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh yes, much, because music is just something that comes to you. You don't question it

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest self is a peaceful smile, that always sees the world smiling back

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is not fair, and often fools, cowards, liars and the selfish hide in high places

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not let your grand ambitions stand in the way of small but meaningful accomplishments

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: Take without forgetting, and give without remembering

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: Within the hearts men, loyalty and consideration are esteemed greater than success

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-made men often worship their creator

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst bullies you will ever encounter in your life are your own thoughts

Quote.Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote.QuoteValue: Seek goodness and be goodness. Seek beauty and be beauty. Seek love and be love

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't have dreams, you don't have a life

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather be a good person off the field than a good baseball player on the field

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: Baseball needs more superstars

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I expect perfection from myself

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not trying to fit in with nobody. I'm just me

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I want my teammates to know I have their backs

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always talked to the media. I'm pretty respectful to the media

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you have to be respectful to the people who want to talk to you

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: If I had to describe myself in one word, 'Hercules.'

Quote.Author: Bryce Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I can squat 405. I'm proud of that - that's one of my favorites

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad's not here, but he's watching in heaven

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Paris is a beautiful city

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am uncomfortable with heights, I'm scared of the dark and I am scared of big crowds

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have got a swing, I have got a shot

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just wanna be me and play golf. I'm just Bubba

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning the green jacket is great - I can pay for all the diapers I'm going to have to get

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love France. France is a nice place

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a dream come true for Bubba Watson from Bagdad, Florida to have the green jacket on

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take anything for granted

Quote.Author: Bubba Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is fulfilled

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: But the love of adventure was in father's blood

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: Excitement was plentiful during my two years' service as a Pony Express rider

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: I had many enemies among the Sioux; I would be running considerable risk in meeting them

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: My restless, roaming spirit would not allow me to remain at home very long

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: I could never resist the call of the trail

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: My debut upon the world's stage occurred on February 26, 1845, in the State of Iowa

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: Quick as lightning Wild Bill pulled his revolver. The stranger fell dead, shot through the brain

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: The cholera had broken out at the post, and five or six men were dying daily

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: I was persuaded now that I was destined to lead a life on the Plains

Quote.Author: Buffalo Bill
Quote.QuoteValue: It was my effort, in depicting the West, to depict it as it was

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: If somebody's in the community doing cool stuff, we'll hire them

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: YouTube's algorithm doesn't know what's going on in the world

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: I lived a significant portion of my life before the Internet and smart phones

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel is stressful

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: We started making content because we wanted to see it, and so our content ended up being genuine

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: I started one of the first online video companies way back in 2003

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, ultimately, the story of Rooster Teeth is going to be one of longevity

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: The good thing about feature films is that the budgets tend to scale

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been playing video games since the Atari 2600 days

Quote.Author: Burnie Burns
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody who has traveled with a significant other before knows it's tough

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: If we can conquer space, we can conquer childhood hunger

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: I still say, 'Shoot for the moon; you might get there.'

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: We must still think of ourselves as pioneers to understand the importance of space

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: The much-hyped Ares 1-X was much ado about nothing

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: I think humans will reach Mars, and I would like to see it happen in my lifetime

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: Some things just can't be described. And stepping onto the moon was one of them

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: It's real easy to manufacture what you think the people want to hear. But that's not very honest

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: Every couple of years, we could dispatch people from Earth to Mars

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: A family needs to work as a team, supporting each other's individual aims and aspirations

Quote.Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote.QuoteValue: Mars is there, waiting to be reached

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate that tabloid idea of anybody who is famous having to forfeit their privacy

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: The kind of classic pose of a female model is to look kind of sexy and a bit annoyed

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want Tina Fey to be my best friend. And Lena Dunham. And Oprah, too

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as I'm concerned, you're a feminist by default if you're born in the Western world right now

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not a confident person, pretend to be one

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not... look very feminine. Diana, Princess of Wales is feminine... I am... femi-none

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can find a frock you look nice in and can run up three flights of stairs, you're not fat

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: Telly never has any smart, amusing intellectuals living on a council estate

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents were hippies. I'm the eldest of eight children

Quote.Author: Caitlin Moran
Quote.QuoteValue: There are 3 billion women in the world, so there are 3 billion ways to be a feminist

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexuality is who you are personally attracted to... But gender identity is who you are in your soul

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: Start early and begin raising the bar throughout the day

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: First of all, I try to be a positive role model

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I still have nightmares about taking tests

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're asking your kids to exercise, then you better do it, too. Practice what you preach

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: We put so much pressure on kids to excel in school at such a young age

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: It's about working when nobody's watching

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I got into sports because that was a way to prove your masculinity. I was good at it

Quote.Author: Caitlyn Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I have struggled with identity all my life. It's not like something that just happened last week

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: You could be a kid for as long as you want when you play baseball

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: By far, the best moment of my big league career was when I caught the last out at the World Series

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind being described as vanilla in certain ways

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I think sportsmanship is a little bit forgotten in place of the individual attention

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I had trouble with my temper all the way through the minor leagues

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Being elected to the Hall of Fame is about your career pretty much and your impact on the game

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always flattered when someone thinks of me as a potential commissioner of baseball

Quote.Author: Cal Ripken, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I see myself as extremely lucky
